name: ascd-final-dougwaffle
description: This respository is intended for the use of Focus College Students enrolled in the Advanced Certificate of Software Development located in Kelowna, BC and Surrey, BC.

scripts.start:compile: npm run compile && npm run start --
scripts.start:lint:compile: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run start --
scripts.start:lint:format:compile: npm run format && npm run start:lint:compile --
scripts.start:lint:format:test:compile: npm run test && npm run start:lint:format:compile --

author: Doug Waffle
